text: The Sathabishekam celebration of Appan Ramanujachariyar is proposed to be held in a grand manner with the chanting of religious scriptures at Chinna Kancheepuram from January 5 to 8. The function will start with the 50th year celebration of Appan Pranatharthiharachar on Tuesday. The Sathabishekam celebration would take place on Friday. For details contact 9443203813/ 9940044552. —staff reporter
title: Sathabishekam to be celebrated
